4141.verse: رَبَّنَا|Our Lord!|81|90|1167$وَأَدْخِلْهُمْ|And admit them|124|142|15077$جَنَّـٰتِ|(to) Gardens|104|122|5122$عَدْنٍ|(of) Eden|82|100|7746$ٱلَّتِى|which|61|79|232$وَعَدتَّهُمْ|You have promised them|183|192|15078$وَمَن|and whoever|105|129|1012$صَلَحَ|(was) righteous|124|172|9437$مِنْ|among|63|112|53$ءَابَآئِهِمْ|their fathers|102|150|5799$وَأَزْوَٲجِهِمْ|and their spouses|137|161|9438$وَذُرِّيَّـٰتِهِمْۚ|and their offspring.|146|161|5800$إِنَّكَ|Indeed You,|100|130|340$أَنتَ|You|58|88|341$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(are) the All-Mighty,|156|186|1187$ٱلْحَكِيمُ|the All-Wise.|105|120|343$

4142.verse: وَقِهِمُ|And protect them|137|154|15079$ٱلسَّيِّـَٔـاتِۚ|(from) the evils.|127|161|3823$وَمَن|And whoever|106|140|1012$تَقِ|you protect|98|132|15080$ٱلسَّيِّـَٔـاتِ|(from) the evils|122|139|3823$يَوْمَئِذٍ|(that) Day,|95|102|3485$فَقَدْ|then verily|90|104|1016$رَحِمْتَهُۥۚ|You bestowed Mercy on him.|212|226|15081$وَذَٲلِكَ|And that|78|92|3792$هُوَ|[it]|48|62|298$ٱلْفَوْزُ|(is) the success,|132|139|3793$ٱلْعَظِيمُ|the great.`|95|95|2284$

4143.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|83|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|114|20$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved|92|118|59$يُنَادَوْنَ|will be cried out to them,|187|212|15082$لَمَقْتُ ٱللَّهِ|`Certainly Allah`s hatred|185|198|15083$أَكْبَرُ|(was) greater|111|121|1897$مِن|than|50|69|53$مَّقْتِكُمْ|your hatred|97|116|15084$أَنفُسَكُمْ|(of) yourselves|120|139|449$إِذْ|when|55|74|1198$تُدْعَوْنَ|you were called|124|143|15085$إِلَى|to|53|63|118$ٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ|the faith,|86|303|7483$فَتَكْفُرُونَ|and you disbelieved.|155|372|15086$

4145.verse: ذَٲلِكُم|`That|69|76|488$بِأَنَّهُۥٓ|(is) because,|107|121|15092$إِذَا|when|55|69|1370$دُعِىَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah was invoked|137|151|15093$وَحْدَهُۥ|Alone|86|100|6518$كَفَرْتُمْۖ|you disbelieved;|127|141|7710$وَإِن|but if|58|65|213$يُشْرَكْ|(others) were associated|187|200|15094$بِهِۦ|with Him,|81|107|204$تُؤْمِنُواْۚ|you believed.|108|134|3003$فَٱلْحُكْمُ|So the judgment|130|156|15095$لِلَّهِ|(is) with Allah,|116|129|6$ٱلْعَلِىِّ|the Most High,|117|330|15096$ٱلْكَبِيرِ|the Most Great.`|133|346|15097$

4147.verse: فَٱدْعُواْ|So invoke|85|92|15100$ٱللَّهَ|Allah,|56|71|184$مُخْلِصِينَ|(being) sincere|119|134|6352$لَهُ|to Him|62|77|1807$ٱلدِّينَ|(in) the religion,|126|141|1208$وَلَوْ|even though|103|118|179$كَرِهَ|dislike (it)|85|92|7154$ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ|the disbelievers.|128|128|4590$

4148.verse: رَفِيعُ ٱلدَّرَجَـٰتِ|Possessor of the Highest Ranks,|232|241|15101$ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ|Owner (of) the Throne;|176|193|15102$يُلْقِى|He places|84|101|12146$ٱلرُّوحَ|the inspiration|114|131|15103$مِنْ|by|50|59|53$أَمْرِهِۦ|His Command|107|115|5256$عَلَىٰ|upon|63|79|52$مَن|whom|58|74|76$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|85|867$مِنْ|of|50|66|53$عِبَادِهِۦ|His slaves,|90|106|868$لِيُنذِرَ|to warn|71|87|10605$يَوْمَ|(of the) Day|102|110|1057$ٱلتَّلَاقِ|(of) the Meeting.|134|134|15104$

4141.verse: Our Lord, and admit them to gardens of perpetual residence which You have promised them and whoever was righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their offspring. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

4142.verse: And protect them from the evil consequences [of their deeds]. And he whom You protect from evil consequences that Day - You will have given him mercy. And that is the great attainment."

4143.verse: Indeed, those who disbelieve will be addressed, "The hatred of Allah for you was [even] greater than your hatred of yourselves [this Day in Hell] when you were invited to faith, but you refused."

4144.verse: They will say, "Our Lord, You made us lifeless twice and gave us life twice, and we have confessed our sins. So is there to an exit any way?"

4145.verse: [They will be told], "That is because, when Allah was called upon alone, you disbelieved; but if others were associated with Him, you believed. So the judgement is with Allah, the Most High, the Grand."

4146.verse: It is He who shows you His signs and sends down to you from the sky, provision. But none will remember except he who turns back [in repentance].

4147.verse: So invoke Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, although the disbelievers dislike it.

4148.verse: [He is] the Exalted above [all] degrees, Owner of the Throne; He places the inspiration of His command upon whom He wills of His servants to warn of the Day of Meeting.

4149.verse: The Day they come forth nothing concerning them will be concealed from Allah. To whom belongs [all] sovereignty this Day? To Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
